Unifesta is a mobile application designed to revolutionize event management within universities, empowering student groups, sports organizations, and event organizers to create a more vibrant and engaged campus community. We are passionate about fostering a dynamic learning environment where students can connect, participate in enriching activities, and contribute to a thriving campus life.Unifesta is a mobile application designed to revolutionize event management within universities, empowering student groups, sports organizations, and event organizers to create a more vibrant and engaged campus community.
